properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paata krotha nibhadanalanduna aravai aaru Pustakamul perlu theliya valenanina daiva krupache vibhajinchi paada valayun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paata nibandhana yandali grandhamul muppadi thommidiyu mari krotha nibhandhana yanduna iravai yedu pustakamulunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aadikaandamu nirgama kandamu leveeyula kaandamu sankhyaa, dwithiyopadesha kaandamul, yehoshuva nyayaadhi patulu Roothu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Modati Samooyelu, rendu samooyelu, modati rendu raajulunu mari okati rendu dinavruthaanthamulunu Ejraa, Nehemyaa, Estheru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yobu keertanalu, solomonu saamethal, prasangi, parama geetamu, yeshayaa, irmiyaa, vilaapamulu yehezkelu, Daaniel, Hosheyaa, Yovelu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aamosu, obadyaa, yonaa, meeka, nahumu, mari habakooku zephanyaa, haggayi, zekaryaa, malaaki, cheppiti muppai thommidi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maththayi, maarku, lukha, yohan, apostalula karyamulu, romaa, okatirendu korindheeyulu, galatiya, epheseeyulu,{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Philippiyu Colosseyu, oka thesalonikaiya rendu thessalonikaiyulu, okati rendu thimothy patrikalunu, theethu, philemon patrika{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hebreeyulunu, yaakobu, peturu okati rendu patrikalun, yohaanu vraasina patrikalu moodunu yudaa, Prakatanayu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aravai aarunu devuni lcheta neeyabadina vedamu daani mokaalla meeda praardhana thoda, Anudinamu chaduvudi{/lang-eng}
